info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:23PM MST until August 25 at 6:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MST FOR EAST CENTRAL PIMA COUNTY... At 622 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tucson International Airport, or near Tucson, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Drexel Heights, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Tucson International Airport, Summit and San Xavier Mission. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
